sentences.en: Dobrynin put only a few perfunctory questions and then asked to see me alone.
sentences.cn: 多勃雷宁只肤皮潦草地提了几个问题.然后就要求同我单独谈话.

sentences.en: Each day Humboodt gave himself a perfunctory shave.
sentences.cn: 洪堡每天都是马马虎虎地刮刮脸.

sentences.en: He brushed by with a perfunctory wave to the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他擦身而过，朝人群敷衍地挥了挥手。

sentences.en: He made a circuit of the docks and the tidal harbor. The security was perfunctory.
sentences.cn: 他绕码头和潮汐港转了一圈, 发现这地方的警戒很马虎.

sentences.en: He made some perfunctory remarks at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他在会上讲了些不痛不痒的话.

sentences.en: His actions, in all that related to his family, were of the most perfunctory kind.
sentences.cn: 他为这个家做的一切, 全是敷衍应付而已.

sentences.en: His remarks at the swearing - in ranged from the perfunctory to the bizarre.
sentences.cn: 他在宣誓仪式上的讲话敷衍赛责,古里古怪.

sentences.en: Mitzi nodded a perfunctory acknowledgement as her glass was filled.
sentences.cn: 杯子被倒满时米芝敷衍性地点头示意。
我们的兴趣只有三分热度。

sentences.en: Ruck, however, agreed that the answer should not be perfunctory.
sentences.cn: 不过, 腊斯克倒是同意答复不应敷衍了事.

sentences.en: She could not be negative or perfunctory about anything.
sentences.cn: 她对任何事情都不抱消极或敷衍的态度.

sentences.en: She gave him a perfunctory smile.
sentences.cn: 她对他漫不经心地笑了笑。

sentences.en: She gave the list only a perfunctory glance.
sentences.cn: 她马马虎虎地扫了一眼清单。
掌声听上去是在敷衍了事。

sentences.en: Then there was a perfunctory embrace of welcome.
sentences.cn: 接着是循例的欢迎拥抱.

sentences.en: There was a perfunctory search of his bags at the airport.
sentences.cn: 在机场他的行李被马马虎虎检查了一下.

sentences.en: They only made a perfunctory effort.

words.tran_cn: 敷衍的；马虎的；得过且过的

trans.tran_cn: 敷衍的，马虎的，肤浅的，浅薄的
trans.tran_en: a perfunctory action is done quickly, and is only done because people expect it
